instructions: Start in a plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up to the starting position.
Hold a dumbbell at your chest, squat down by bending your knees and hips, then push through your heels to return to standing.
Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip the barbell, lift it by straightening your legs and hips, then lower it back to the ground.
Keep your forearms on the ground, body in a straight line from head to heels, and hold the position.
Swing the kettlebell between your legs, then explosively drive your hips forward to swing it to shoulder height.
Anchor the band, hold handles with arms extended, then pull toward your torso by squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead, then return to the starting position and repeat.

exercise_name: Dead Bug with Overhead Band Tension
instructions: Hold band overhead, extend limbs alternately while keeping tension.
Lift kettlebell with one hand from side while keeping back flat.
Slide arms up wall, then lift slightly away from wall, hold and return.
Lift one leg, press hips up with opposite glute, control down.
